## IPixelBuffer interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPixelBuffer<T extends TypedArray, P> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./pixel.ipixelbuffer.height.md) | <code>number</code> |  |
|  [pixels](./pixel.ipixelbuffer.pixels.md) | <code>T</code> |  |
|  [width](./pixel.ipixelbuffer.width.md) | <code>number</code> |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getAt(x, y)](./pixel.ipixelbuffer.getat.md) | Returns pixel value at given position. If pos is outside the defined region, returns a suitable zero value. |
|  [getRegion(x, y, width, height)](./pixel.ipixelbuffer.getregion.md) | Extracts region as new pixel buffer in same format. |
|  [setAt(x, y, col)](./pixel.ipixelbuffer.setat.md) | Writes pixel value at given position. Has no effect if outside of the defined region. |
